Two best friends setting out to explore the west coast in our favorite outfits! We love fashion, photography, lettering, anything with glitter on it, and have a slight obsession with flamingoes! Follow us on our journey and we hope to inspire you along the way! 

With lots of love, 

Aileen & Rory

","author":"Aileen","publisher":{"name":"LovelySunday","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://static1.squarespace.com/static/547b94a8e4b045935f3ae973/t/54a78801e4b0c309d01bca33/1589148119935/"},"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"Organization"},"image":"http://static1.squarespace.com/static/547b94a8e4b045935f3ae973/564a714ee4b0b5206c34977c/59309423e3df28873466d5f7/1516744406287/L1010099.jpg?format=1500w","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"Article"}
mainText: Jan 23 Ouai-STED with Jen Atkin! Confession: I have a real obsession with Ouai products! Yes, the packaging is perfect (what can I say, I‚Äôm married to a designer) and all the products smell so delicious! I have thick, frizz prone, color treated hair and these products combined with my shampoo & conditioner give me the exact look i want-finally! Ouai was created by celebrity hair genius Jen Atkin, who is know for creating the lived-in textured hair that gives you the perfect model off duty look. Atkin‚Äôs clients range from Chrissy Tiegen, Jenna Dewan Tatum, to Bella Hadid and their looks never disappoint! But, don‚Äôt be swayed by her client list because Atkin‚Äôs products and tutorials make her perfect looks attainable for the girl on the go. Her ‚Äúless is more‚Äù mantra is one I can get behind when it comes to styling my hair! Here she is working on one of my favorite bloggers Marianna Hewitt and with the incomparable Kahlana Barfield to show us how to get the perfect waves. Check out my favorite Ouai products below and how I use them! üòÉ Textured Hairspray- Atkin describes this as ‚Äúif hairspray and dry shampoo had a baby.‚Äù Really tho, she‚Äôs not wrong! It gives your hair a flexible hold while giving you the piecey texture dry shampoo provides. When I apply this, I hold the ends of my hair and let it fall while spraying the product in. This technique helps to apply the product more evenly and really gets it into the depths of the hair to ensure layers of texture. Wave Spray- I use this after rough drying my hair when I want a beachy look (or if I don‚Äôt feel like curling or straightening my hair). Since I have natural wavy hair, this helps to give it definition and then I just touch it up with my curling iron. Rose Hair & Body Oil- I really can‚Äôt express how heavenly this smells. I am a huge fan of rose products and this one is hands down one of my favorites. The light, silky consistency is so hydrating and I love that it is a fast drying oil. You can use this on your hair or skin to provide a beautiful scent and a light shimmer on the skin all while soaking in the rich oils. Perfection all around! Matte Pomade- This is my latest trial from the Ouai line, I love having a moldable product to give texture to the ends of my hair that won‚Äôt weigh it down. You can also twist small sections of your hair and apply this to give a more dimensional look to your tresses. The pearl bobby pins are part of Chloe & Isabel's collab with Jen Atkin. They range from large to small and can be used in so many creative ways to really make your whole look complete. See the whole collection here! I look forward to tying more products from the line and I hope you are as in love with these products as I am! Let me know what you think on instagram. *LS Extra Tip- Ouai also sells travel size options for a weekend get-away or if you want to test the product before fully committing to the full size option. Happy Styling!! Aileen Subscribe to my latest looks! Be the first the see the latest looks or blogs from the Lookbook! SIGN UP Recently from the Lookbook Jan 7, 2019 Aileen YSL Studio Paris, France Find me on @Instagram @_lovelysunday

paragraphs: Confession: I have a real obsession with Ouai products! Yes, the packaging is perfect (what can I say, I‚Äôm married to a designer) and all the products smell so delicious! I have thick, frizz prone, color treated hair and these products combined with my shampoo & conditioner give me the exact look i want-finally!

Ouai was created by celebrity hair genius Jen Atkin, who is know for creating the lived-in textured hair that gives you the perfect model off duty look. Atkin‚Äôs clients range from Chrissy Tiegen, Jenna Dewan Tatum, to Bella Hadid and their looks never disappoint! But, don‚Äôt be swayed by her client list because Atkin‚Äôs products and tutorials make her perfect looks attainable for the girl on the go. Her ‚Äúless is more‚Äù mantra is one I can get behind when it comes to styling my hair! Here she is working on one of my favorite bloggers Marianna Hewitt and with the incomparable Kahlana Barfield to show us how to get the perfect waves.
Check out my favorite Ouai products below and how I use them! üòÉ

Textured Hairspray- Atkin describes this as ‚Äúif hairspray and dry shampoo had a baby.‚Äù Really tho, she‚Äôs not wrong! It gives your hair a flexible hold while giving you the piecey texture dry shampoo provides. When I apply this, I hold the ends of my hair and let it fall while spraying the product in. This technique helps to apply the product more evenly and really gets it into the depths of the hair to ensure layers of texture.

Wave Spray- I use this after rough drying my hair when I want a beachy look (or if I don‚Äôt feel like curling or straightening my hair). Since I have natural wavy hair, this helps to give it definition and then I just touch it up with my curling iron.

Rose Hair & Body Oil- I really can‚Äôt express how heavenly this smells. I am a huge fan of rose products and this one is hands down one of my favorites. The light, silky consistency is so hydrating and I love that it is a fast drying oil. You can use this on your hair or skin to provide a beautiful scent and a light shimmer on the skin all while soaking in the rich oils. Perfection all around!

Matte Pomade- This is my latest trial from the Ouai line, I love having a moldable product to give texture to the ends of my hair that won‚Äôt weigh it down. You can also twist small sections of your hair and apply this to give a more dimensional look to your tresses.

The pearl bobby pins are part of Chloe & Isabel's collab with Jen Atkin. They range from large to small and can be used in so many creative ways to really make your whole look complete. See the whole collection here!
I look forward to tying more products from the line and I hope you are as in love with these products as I am! Let me know what you think on instagram.
*LS Extra Tip- Ouai also sells travel size options for a weekend get-away or if you want to test the product before fully committing to the full size option.
